mrdrivers 0.5.1
  • Reference

calcGDPpc

Source: R/calcGDPpc.R
calcGDPpc.Rd

calcGDPpc

calcGDPpc(
  GDPpcCalib = c("calibSSPs", "calibSDPs", "calibSSP2EU"),
  GDPpcPast = c("WDI-MI", "WDI-MI", "Eurostat-WDI-MI"),
  GDPpcFuture = c("SSPs-MI", "SDPs-MI", "SSP2EU-MI"),
  unit = "constant 2005 Int$PPP",
  extension2150 = "bezier",
  FiveYearSteps = TRUE,
  average2020 = TRUE,
  naming = "indicator_scenario"
)

Arguments

GDPpcCalib

String or vector of strings

GDPpcPast

String or vector of strings

GDPpcFuture

String or vector of strings

unit

A string. Either 'constant 2005 Int$PPP', 'constant 2005 US$MER', 'constant 2017 Int$PPP' or 'constant 2017 US$MER'. In either case, the scenario construction is done in Int$PPP, with the conversion to US$MER coming afterward.

extension2150

string, either "bezier", "constant" or "none"

FiveYearSteps

FiveYearSteps = TRUE is no longer supported; use the calcOutput argument years instead, to retrieve specific years.

average2020

TRUE or FALSE. If TRUE, then the 2020 value is replaced by the 2018-2022 average.

naming

naming scheme

Value

A magpie object with sets "iso3c", "year" and "variable".

See also

madrat::calcOutput()

Other GDPpc functions: calcGDPpcFuture(), calcGDPpcPast()

Other Combined scenario functions: calcGDP(), calcPopulation(), calcUrbanPop(), calcUrban()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
library(mrdrivers)
calcOutput("GDPpc")
}
